snippet.title: Once upon a time… | Dev Diaries | Scars of Honor
snippet.description:
Download the BeastBurst App 👇
🍎 Apple App Store - https://beast.ly/7fZCVjQ
🤖 Google Play Store - https://beast.ly/Nnz53Bu

👕 The Beast Burst Merch Shop - https://beast.ly/OcdIiKU

Marvelous Community,
We are very excited to announce the start of our Developer Diary series.
In each Dev Diary, you will be meeting various members of the team behind "Scars of Honor".
For the first one, we want you to meet our Founder and CEO, who will tell you more about how he started the project, how the studio was made, and what the future has in store for the project.

Don't hesitate to leave a comment and tell us what you think!

Join us now: https://www.beastburst.com/games/scars-of-honor

Don't forget to like us, share us, and hit the bell, to make sure you don't miss our next videos!

Official Links:
Discord: https://discord.gg/jDSuQVgwHF
Website: https://www.scarsofhonor.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ScarsOfHonor.Official/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/scars.of.honor/
Twitter: ​https://twitter.com/scars_of_honor/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/ScarsofHonor/

#MMORPG #devdiary #madewithunity #madewithunity3d #gamedevelopment #game  #gamingpc #indiegame #gamedev  #indiedev #indiegamedev #RPG #scarsofhonor  #developerdiaries

Chapters:
Intro - 0:00
Chapter 1 | How It All Started- 1:22
Chapter 2 | What Is "Scars Of Honor" ? - 4:00
Chapter 3 | The Ultimate Goal - 5:03
Chapter 4 | Key Features : PVP- 5:42
Chapter 5 | Key Features : PVE -  6:12
Chapter 6 | Key Features : Player Housing-  6:47
Chapter 7 | The Test : June 12 2021 - 7:13
Chapter 8 | In Conclusion 8:10
Outro - 8:56
